testUtils

Class LinksTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • testUtils.LinksTest

  • public class LinksTest
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class LinksTest is a utility to test the links on a given web page. This utility collects all links on a given url, and tests them one by one. It tries navigating to each of the links and checks their status. The test utility returns a list of links and their status in a given structure -

      • enableLog

        public void enableLog()
        EnableLog This method enables the logging. Two log files are created by default -
        See Also:
        General Log - concatenates messages to end of file, specific execution log - name includes timestamp

      • disableLog

        public void disableLog()
        Disable This method disables the logging. The next two log files will be disabled-
        See Also:
        General Log - concatenates messages to end of file, specific execution log - name includes timestamp
